channel.title: Weed-Scape v2 - 317 - [staff positions open] - [good coder needed]
channel.description:
[color=black]This is my first ever server/ post i hope you all enjoy. i really just wanted a server for all the stoner's out there! :D I am in need of a coder for the server and staff positions are open! The up-time is brilliant unless i get really high one day and forget about my laptop lol... i need to make the client into a jar but my computer wont let me do it so if someone can it would be very usefull![/color]
some things i would like to add: - a spliff that you can smoke (use weed on rizila maybe to create it) - a fully functional new skill called rolling or smoking weed that you can progress on - a good voting system
things i added: - new secret area - more npc's and drops - 1 hit ko weapon - kalphite queen - added weed to shop for 2b (price may be lowered) - sorted out some teleports - new client paint - new inventory paint more to come!
credit goes to Rune-PK, Elite PK and whoever else helped them.
[url=http://weedscape.forumotion.co.uk]weedscape.forumotion.co.uk[/url] <-- The forum link!
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ira0a39jbs93vab]http://www.mediafire.com/?ira0a39jbs93vab[/url] <-- Client download!
Some images to show you a little: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20qxlcg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35lgq9y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2r7u1w5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2jbpdlj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/24phpxy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zz3z0y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/35mgzro.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/dph5ow.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1hzcrq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2dv7nud.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2r7r23l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/213jarr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/15ouowk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2r3gzgw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fk62r8.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:28, topic:481554”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=599790.msg4215049#msg4215049 date=1360127431]

weed is cool

But to name your server Weed Scape? It’s not a good name(like I stated above just makes you look like a kid trying to look cool).
[/quote]

/sarcasm

most people that associate with weed i would like to punch in the face[/quote]

Ohgod thank you. I’m terrible at seeing sarcasm over the internet XD sorry

Read full topic
